messages.AZ_AzureRMProfileModuleNotFound: Module 'AzureRM.Profile' not found. The 'AzureRM' module may not be fully installed. Running the  following PowerShell commands from an elevated session may resolve the issue: Import-Module AzureRM ; Install-AzureRM
